title: Thailand Friendly Design Expo 2023
description: .▫️”Thailand Friendly Design Expo” — a world-class event at the end of this year!Let’s drive Thailand towards the goal of being the MICE for All, tourism for all, Friendly Design for all and international medical hub city that leaves no one behind.See you in the 7th Thailand Friendly Design Expo 2023, the exhibition which showing, selling, and promoting products, innovations, and services related to health, wellness, tourism, hotels, MICE business and friendly design.This is going to be the most spectacular event in ASEAN holding on 7-10 December 2023 at Hall 100-101, covering an area of 12,000 square meters at BITEC Exhibition and Convention Center, Bangna, Bangkok.Reserve now to get the best booth space! Contact us at 083-139-8888, 098-119- 9888, 081-855-1199 or email us at [email protected] .. 世界级盛会！“泰国全民设计展”一起推动泰国成为全民旅游城市、全民设计城市、MICE 业务城市与国际医疗中心 。《泰国2023年全民设计展》将展示、销售和推广与 医疗、健康、旅游、酒店、MICE 业务和全民设计相关的产品、创新和服务。这将是东盟最壮观的展场，将在 2023 年 12 月 7 日至 10 日在曼谷班纳 BITEC 会展中心的 101 号馆举行，占地面积 12,000 平方米。立即预订最佳展位！请致电我们 ： 083-139-8888、098-119-9888、081-855-1199 或发送电子邮件至 [email protected]
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
